item.title: Making a Brick Model
item.description: RDF Triples Example Building Creating the Brick Model Here we review the construction and Brick representation of a small example building. Data Model Brick can be thought of as a vocabulary for describing the things in the building and how they relate to each other. In Brick, names for things are referred to as tagsets and names for how these things are connected are called relationships. For example, an instance of a VAV would have a feeds relationship with an HVAC_Zone.
